hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Auto-format Python files with ruff (matches CI: ruff format)
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory && uv run ruff format $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: lint-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Check lint errors with ruff (matches CI: ruff check src/ tests/)
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory && uv run ruff check $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS --output-format=concise 2>/dev/null | head -20 || true

hooks.name: typecheck-on-edit
hooks.description: Type check with mypy strict mode (matches CI: mypy src/)
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory && uv run mypy $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>&1 | grep -E 'error:' | head -10 || true

hooks.name: security-scan-on-edit
hooks.description: Security scan with bandit (matches CI: bandit -r src/ -ll)
hooks.command: cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory && uv run bandit -ll $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null | grep -E '^>>' | head -10 || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full CI quality check before git commits (format, lint, typecheck, security, tests)
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cd /Users/AllenR1_1/Projects/zircote/git-notes-memory && make quality; fi
